author: Daniel Winks
releaseNotes:
v0.1.19 Significantly improve favorites matching. Fix regressions on mute/group mute introduced when adding balance controls.
v0.1.18 Fix loadFavoriteFull not passing params properly.
v0.1.17 Fix trackDescrption using album name instead of track name.
v0.1.16 Fix album and artist being reversed. Add break tag to better format album art.
v0.1.15 Default to 'repeat all' for 'loadFavorite' rather than 'repeat one' for better behaviour with favorites containing more than one track.
v0.1.14 Set 'trackDescrption' for radio streams as well, in situations where currentAlbum and currentArtist are unavailable.
v0.1.13 Add 'trackDescrption' ('%currentAlbum% by %currentArtist%}' format) when available, as it's needed for Hubitat Dashboards.
v0.1.12 Fix 'null' naming issue during device discovery/creation.
v0.1.11 Add balance controls for stereo pairs ðŸŽ‰ Changes to allow change ip addresses of speakers.
v0.1.10 Fix 'Play Track And Restore\Resume' issue.
v0.1.9 Fix set group volume
v0.1.8 Fixes for album art, current/next info, improved logging.
v0.1.7 Fixes for "Toggle All On/Off" being included in groups.
